General.Name: Capex S.A
General.Description: Capex S.A., an integrated energy company, engages in the generation and sale of thermal electric and renewable power in Argentina. It also explores and produces hydrocarbon; explores for oil and gas; and produces and sells oil, propane, butane, and gasoline. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Vicente López, Argentina. Capex S.A. is a subsidiary of Companias Asociadas Petroleras S.A.
General.Address: Carlos F. Melo 630, Vicente López, Argentina, 1638
